ON A BLACK SCREEN, THE FOLLOWING CRAWL: MOSCOW, 17 JULY 1991. THE KREMLIN ANNOUNCED THE 'RETIREMENT' OF MIKAHIL, GORBACHEV AS WELL AS POLITBURO MEMBERS YAVOLEV, MENDVENDEV AND BIRKOVO. it put to sea this morning.
